channel.title: Whonix won't import all of a sudden
channel.description:
I just got a new laptop and put ubuntu on it, however, after installing virtualbox and downloading the two whonix files they won't work at all!
Error message is
failed to important appliance (path)
Could not create the clone medium /home/usr/Virtualbox VMs/Whonix-Gateway/Whonix-Gateway-9.4-disk1.vmdk' (VERR_ZIP_ERROR).
Very strange. Is it because it's OVA not OVF? I dunno, really I'm at a loss, I'm sure it's something simple
Thanks

item.title: Whonix won't import all of a sudden
item.dc:creator: onionfields
item.description:
yes, it seems more a problem with virtualbox, tried a few things and they didn’t work, will keep at it

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix won't import all of a sudden

item.title: Whonix won't import all of a sudden
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
ova is VBox standard format, that we distribute. No changes here. Never distributed ovf.

Did you verify after download?

Whonix – 31 Dec 19

FREE Whonix ™ Download for Windows, macOS, Linux and Others

FREE Download Whonix ™. Privacy Protection. Anonymity Online. For Windows, macOS, Linux.
